name: Hyper Jump - Bouncing Ball
description:
How high can you jump?
Rotate the helix to jump as high as you can in an exciting fun arcade game that will have you jumping for hours!

Jump Up Up and Away!
Prepare to jump to the highest of highs in the most addicting jumping game out there! Start with your ball, rotate the helix to keep the ball jumping, and advance through hundreds of levels! Don’t miss the landing, or it’s GAME OVER!

Fun NEW characters, obstacles, and surprises await you as you move up the helix. The higher you jump, the bigger the surprises!

Fun Jumpin’ Feature
- Collect coins as you jump and use them to upgrade your ball! Choose your ball or character and get jumping!
- Progression bar allows you to track your progress on every level. How much higher do you have to jump?
- Play exciting Pachinko games to collect more prizes every 5 levels!
- A Fast and easy, yet challenging game. Hyper Jump is a free casual game for everyone!
- Advance through hundreds of free game levels!
- The smoothest gameplay all jumping ball games you’ve ever played!
- A fun game that’s completely FREE to play!

Everyone knows that 2019 is about to be the year of jumping balls! Let’s get jumping!
